Run4YourBits

Class RandomRange

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Random
      • Run4YourBits.RandomRange
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class RandomRange
extends java.util.Random
    This class creates random numbers in a certain range, it includes inclusive and exclusive methods
    See Also:
